# NSUTF16StringEncoding | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSUTF16StringEncoding ](/documentation/Foundation/NSUTF16StringEncoding)

-  NSUTF16StringEncoding 

Global Variable# NSUTF16StringEncoding

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
var NSUTF16StringEncoding: UInt { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSUTF16StringEncoding#Discussion)

An alias for `NSUnicodeStringEncoding`.

## [See Also](/documentation/Foundation/NSUTF16StringEncoding#see-also)

### [Unicode Encodings](/documentation/Foundation/NSUTF16StringEncoding#Unicode-Encodings)

[`var NSUTF8StringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf8stringencoding)An 8-bit representation of Unicode characters, suitable for transmission or storage by ASCII-based systems.[`var NSUTF16BigEndianStringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf16bigendianstringencoding)`NSUTF16StringEncoding` encoding with explicit endianness specified.[`var NSUTF16LittleEndianStringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf16littleendianstringencoding)`NSUTF16StringEncoding` encoding with explicit endianness specified.[`var NSUnicodeStringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsunicodestringencoding)The canonical Unicode encoding for string objects.[`var NSUTF32BigEndianStringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf32bigendianstringencoding)`NSUTF32StringEncoding` encoding with explicit endianness specified.[`var NSUTF32LittleEndianStringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf32littleendianstringencoding)`NSUTF32StringEncoding` encoding with explicit endianness specified.[`var NSUTF32StringEncoding: UInt`](/documentation/foundation/nsutf32stringencoding)32-bit UTF encoding.
